channel.title: Fashion TV on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Fashion TV on 0x000216

item.title: You can now access Fashion Television as a standalone satellite channel in Asia
item.description: Source: Fashion Television website. Asian fashion enthusiasts can now enjoy Fashion Television as a dedicated satellite channel. While Fashion Television has been offering fashion programming to Asian viewers as part of other content blocks since 1999, this dedicated channel allows over a billion people access to its content 24/7. Fashion Television International, based in London, opted to utilize the Asiasat 7 satellite, operated by Hong Kong’s Asiasat Satellite Telecommunications Co.
